Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
AddBackEventSimple structure-like class to store info on addback reconstructed event
Anl1471ProcessorClass to process VANDLE related events
BarBuilderClass that builds bars out of a list of ends
BarDetectorA class to handle detectors that have two readouts viewing the same volume
Beta4Hen3ProcessorClass to handle Beta events for the 3Hen detector
BetaProcessorDetector processor that handles scintillator events for beta detection (deprecated)
BetaScintProcessorDetector processor that handles scintillator detectors for beta detection
CalibrationParamsThis structure holds walk calibration model identfier, range of calibration and vector of parameters needed for the function
CalibratorClass to handle energy calibrations
CfdAnalyzerClass to analyze traces using a digital CFD
ChanEventA channel event
ConversionExceptionError in conversion of string to numerical or boolean value
CorrectionParamsThis structure holds walk calibration model identfier and vector of parameters needed for the function
CorrelationListThe list of correlations
CorrelatorCorrelate decays with previous implants
CrosstalkProcessorA generic processor to be used as a template for others
IonChamberProcessor::DataA Data structure to handle all of the info for the chamber
DetectorDriverDetectorDriver controls event processing
DetectorLibraryA class to define a library of detectors known to the analysis
DetectorSummarySummary of all channels of one detector type
DoubleBetaProcessorA generic processor to be used as a template for others
Dssd4SHEProcessorClass to handle DSSDs for Super heavy element experiments
DssdProcessorHandles detectors of type dssd_front and dssd_back
EventDataSimple structure holding basic parameters needed for correlation of events in the same place
EventInfoStructure to contain the event info
EventProcessorClass to handle event processing
exception
FittingAnalyzer::FitDataStructure necessary for the GSL fitting routines
FittingAnalyzerAnalyzer that handles the fitting of traces for High Resolution Timing
Ge4Hen3ProcessorClass to handle Ge clovers for 3Hen experiments
GeCalibProcessorA class to handle the calibrations for the Ge Processor
GeneralExceptionException with customizable message
GeneralWarningWarning with customizable message
GeProcessorProcessor to handle Ge (read as clover) events

Hen3ProcessorProcessor to handle 3Hen detector

IdentifierChannel identification
ImplantSsdProcessorHandles detectors of type ssd:implant
IOExceptionRead/write exception for all file operation related tasks
IonChamberProcessorProcessor to handle ion chambers
IS600ProcessorClass Analyze for ISOLDE experiments 599 and 600
Labr3TestProcessorA generic processor to be used as a template for others
LiquidProcessorProcessor for Liquid Scintillators - Deprecated
LiquidScintProcessorClass to handle liquid scintillator
LitePositionProcessorVersion of PositionProcessor that is light weight
LogicProcessorClass to handle logic signals
McpProcessor::McpDataData structure to hold MCP data
McpProcessorClass that handles MCP detectors
MessengerThis class outputs nicely formatted messages during configuration loading
NeutronProcessorProcessor for handling scintillator neutron detectors - Deprecated
NeutronScintProcessorClass to handle Neutron Scintillators (that are not VANDLE)
NotebookA class to output things to a notebook
NotImplementedUse this exception if feature is not implemented yet
PlaceA pure abstract class to define a "place" for correlator
PlaceANDSimilar to PlaceOR but uses AND relation
PlaceBuilderCreate place, alter or add existing place to the tree
PlaceCounterCounts number of activations coming from directly or from children
PlaceDetectorThe basic detector which does not depend on children status. Will use info_ map to store additional information
PlaceLazy"Lazy" Place does not store multiple activation or deactivation events. Abstract class
PlaceORAn abstract place using OR logic to set the activation of places
PlaceThresholdEach activation must be within the set thresholds
PlaceThresholdOREach activation must be within the set thresholds
PlotsHolds pointers to all Histograms
PlotsRegisterHolds ranges and offsets of all plots. Singleton class
PositionProcessorProcessor to calculate the position in SSDs
PspmtProcessor::PspmtDataStructure defining what data we're storing
PspmtProcessorClass to handle processing of position sensitive pmts
PulserProcessorA class to handle time differences between two pulsers
RandomPoolA random pool of numbers using Mersenne twister - Singleton Class
RawEventThe all important raw event
RootProcessorA Class to handle outputting things into ROOT
ScintProcessorObsoltete Class to handle scintillator events
SheCorrelatorClass to handle correlations for super heavy event experiments
SheEventA class to define information for a super-heavy element event
SsdProcessorHandles detectors of type dssd_front and dssd_back (Deprecated - Duplicate!)

TemplateProcessorA generic processor to be used as a template for others

TimingCalibratorClass to handle time calibrations for bar type detectors - Singleton
TimingMapBuilderA class that builds timing maps from a list of ChanEvents
TraceStore the information for a trace
TraceAnalyzerAbstract class that all trace analyzers are derived from
TraceExtractorA class to extract traces from events
TraceFilter
TraceFilterAnalyzerA class to perform trapezoidal filters on the traces
TrapFilterParametersSimple class that holds trapezoidal filter parameters
TreeCorrelatorSingleton class holding map of all places
TreeCorrelatorExceptionException in the TreeCorrelator, both reading and parsing XML file, as well as creating new places, accessing places etc

vector
